reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A very relaxed and secluded bed and breakfast. Fantastic attention to detail by Peter and Sally Wyatt our hosts. Very comfortable bedroom with plenty of space. Excellent homemade/fresh cooked breakfast at a very civilised hour! A great place to chill out and relax!
reviews.title: A great rural retreat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in double room with my husband. Our friends and their son stayed in the larger family room. Both rooms were a really good size with really lovely and charming decor throughout. The beds and pillows were very comfy.
reviews.title: Charming, cosy, quiet and friendly - would definitely go back!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The owners were very welcoming and they serve an amazing breakfast!
reviews.title: everything just right

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is a 10 - 15 minute walk into town, but it was a nice walk and the perfect distance for us.
reviews.title: Best of old and new

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only possible negative: Some may find the bathroom a bit tight as it is small, but not cramped. However, we loved it and will definitely go back!
reviews.title: Charming, peaceful, quirky; spoil yourselves you deserve it!

reviews.text: We didn't think we'd get to have a break this year due to a recent little addition to the family! But when the opportunity arose to go away for a couple of nights and take the new baby on her first holiday, our first thought was to return to Star Cottage.
reviews.title: Just as good second time around....

reviews.text: Both Sally and Peter were more than accommodating with our little one, which was reassuring as we were concerned that some small places may be apprehensive about new babies disturbing the other guests, but they were great and more than welcomed her to the B&B.
reviews.title: Absolutely excellent customer service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything else about the B&B is covered in my previous review, great rooms, great decor, great location, great breakfast (make sure you have the sausages!!!), fantastic value, friendly hosts etc. I really wanted to just add a second mini review to make the point that Star Cottage are kiddie friendly and maintain a consistency in all areas that make it a truly great place to stay. We will be going back again, the wife was already planning it on our journey home!
reviews.title: I felt genuine English life at star cottage.

reviews.text: I stayed in this bed and breakfast for a friend's wedding. As I was travelling by train the landlord offerred to collect me from Charlbury train station which is excellent customer service. I stayed in the Barn which was clean and with excellent amenities including a good shower, iPod dock anc fully equipped kitchen. Forf breakfast we had a proper English breakfast with fresh local produce. I don't nlormally write reviews of hotels I have stayed at but felt obliged to as it was such a good stay.
reviews.title: Excellent B&B in Burford

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We took one month trip to England by ourselves at our 70s in June and July last year. We do not have confidence in English conversation but we love England very much. It was our second trip to England and got loved things more and more. Especially we were moved by people’s way of thinking and also of life--humble, simple and so on.
reviews.title: The perfect B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife & I stayed here for 2 nights in July 2010.
reviews.title: Great Place to explore Cotswolds

reviews.text: Our hosts were lovely and Burford is my favourite place in the Cotswolds - it has the best eating (you must try the Lamb Inn - Michelin Star restaurant) and is fairly well located to explore the other towns.
reviews.title: Picture-postcard perfect

reviews.text: The room, indeed, the whole of the guest wing of the cottage was beautifully furnished, with a lot of pieces hand crafted by Sally (my wife was really taken with one of the lamp shades in the sitting room).
reviews.title: Great accommodation and superb hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bedroom was really tastefully decorated with ample storage and wardrobe space and and excellent en suite shower. The bed was really comfortable, and with Star Cottage being off the main roads and the guest wing separated from the main house, we enjoyed good nights sleep throughout our stay.
reviews.title: Very good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was excellent, a good selection of fruit, cereals and juices and a hearty full english freshly served up by Peter every morning.
reviews.title: Lovely
